description:
Access the menu of Dresden's canteens.
Mensen provides a convenient way to explore and choose from a variety of meal options available at different canteens across the campus.

Card reader
* Show your current balance by holding the card to the back of your device

Canteens
* Reorder canteens for fast access
* Show regular and temporarily changed opening times
* Find the nearest canteen on the map

Menus
* Swipe through different canteens to compare your choices
* Get the latest meal information
* Hide irrelevant meals if you are vegan or vegetarian
